name: BuildWin
summary: View the output of a build in progress.
description:
BuildWin allows you to view the progress of a build within the Vim instance.  When a build is finished, it will automatically load the results into the error list.

see ':help buildwin'
install_details:
- Unzip the files into your Vim runtime path (vimfiles on Windows, .vim on Unix)
- In Vim, run ':helptags' to rebuild your help file
- Restart Vim
